comments.body: This seems like a pretty weak test.  Is this just testing that things don't blow up?
Yeah, basically just checks so things don't blow up. Obviously more tests could get added here but wanted to at least get the structure checked.
It would be much stronger to verify what is written here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +180,184 @@		c := CreateBasicClientConfig(rt.cc.c, rt.cc.s, rt.cc.ca)
		err := WriteKubeconfigIfNotExists(rt.name, c)
		if err != rt.expected {
			t.Errorf(
				"failed WriteKubeconfigIfNotExists with an error:\n\texpected: %s\n\t  actual: %s",
